original_text: then the Lord God formed the man of dust from the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life, and the man became a living creature.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 땅의 흙으로 사람을 지으시고 생기를 그 코에 불어넣으시니 사람이 생령이 되니라

sentences.original_text: then the Lord God formed the man of dust from the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주 하나님께서 땅의 흙으로 사람을 지으시고

sentences.original_text: and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life
and the man became a living creature
